entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
